name: G√©n√©rer des l√©gendes pour les r√©seaux sociaux pour les images de produits avec Gemini AI et approbation Telegram
description:
Ce mod√®le n8n d√©montre un pipeline de contenu complet pilot√© par l'IA pour les r√©seaux sociaux. Il g√©n√®re automatiquement des l√©gendes et des hashtags pour de nouvelles images de produits, collecte l'approbation humaine via Telegram et publie le contenu approuv√© sur Twitter. Il est id√©al pour les marketeurs, les entreprises de commerce √©lectronique et les cr√©ateurs qui souhaitent acc√©l√©rer la cr√©ation de contenu tout en gardant un contr√¥le humain.

## Comment √ßa fonctionne

**D√©clencheur** : Le flux de travail commence lorsqu'un nouveau fichier est ajout√© √† un dossier sp√©cifique de Google Drive.

**Analyse de fichier :** L'image est trait√©e pour extraire les informations sur le produit.

**L√©gendage AI :** Gemini g√©n√®re une l√©gende et cinq hashtags pertinents bas√©s sur le produit.

**Approbation Telegram :** L'image, la l√©gende et les hashtags sont envoy√©s √† l'utilisateur pour approbation.

‚úÖ Si approuv√© ‚Üí Le contenu est publi√© sur Twitter et une confirmation est renvoy√©e via Telegram.

üîÑ Si r√©g√©n√©rer ‚Üí Gemini cr√©e une nouvelle l√©gende et des hashtags, et la boucle d'approbation se r√©p√®te.

‚ùå Si rejeter ‚Üí Un message est envoy√© sur Telegram et le flux de travail se termine.

## Exigences

- Compte Google Drive

- Identifiants API Gemini pour le l√©gendage et les hashtags

- Bot Telegram pour les approbations

- Compte d√©veloppeur Twitter avec identifiants API

## Personnalisation de ce flux de travail

- √âchanger Google Drive contre Dropbox, Notion ou Airtable comme source de contenu.

- √âtendre la publication √† LinkedIn, Instagram ou plusieurs plateformes.

- Ajouter des flux d'approbation multi-utilisateurs dans Telegram pour des d√©cisions en √©quipe.

parameters.text:
You are an image analysis assistant. Analyze the given image carefully and provide a structured JSON output with the following fields:

{
  "objects": ["list of main objects or items visible in the image"],
  "subject": "the main subject or product of the image",
  "colors": ["primary and secondary colors present"],
  "background": "description of the background or setting",
  "style": "the style of the image (e.g. professional photo, selfie, product shot, illustration, etc.)",
  "mood": "the mood or feeling conveyed by the image",
  "possible_use_cases": ["possible purposes of the image, e.g. advertisement, social media post, product showcase, art, etc."]
}

Make the response concise, factual, and machine-readable. Do not generate captions or hashtags here, just the structured description.

Return only valid JSON. 
Do not include explanations, markdown formatting, or code fences.

parameters.content:
# Social Media Bot: AI Captioning, Approval & Auto-Tweet

This n8n template demonstrates a complete AI-assisted social media workflow. It automatically generates captions and hashtags for product images, allows human approval through Telegram, and posts approved content to Twitter.

## How it works

**Trigger**: A new file in Google Drive starts the workflow.

**File Analysis**: Product details are extracted from the uploaded image.

**AI Captioning**: Gemini generates a caption and 5 suggested hashtags.

**Telegram Approval**: The user receives the image + caption + hashtags and chooses to approve, regenerate, or discard.

‚úÖ Approve ‚Üí The content is posted on Twitter and a confirmation is sent back on Telegram.

üîÑ Regenerate ‚Üí Gemini creates a new caption + hashtags and sends them again for approval.

‚ùå Discard ‚Üí The user is notified on Telegram and the workflow ends.

## Requirements

1. Google Drive account

2. Gemini API credentials (LLM access)

3. Telegram bot for approvals + confirmations

4. Twitter Developer Account & API credentials

## Customising this workflow

- Swap Google Drive with Dropbox, Notion, or Airtable as your source.

- Replace Twitter with LinkedIn, Instagram, or multiple channels at once.

- Expand Telegram approval flow to include team voting or multi-step review.

parameters.message: Confirm whether to regenerate or discard the image and stop the process.

parameters.text: ‚úÖ Your tweet has been successfully posted!
üóëÔ∏è The image has been discarded successfully.

parameters.content:
## Request_Media_ID Node
This node is used to upload the image to twitter server and this request will return us with a **Media_ID**, which is used to display product image in tweet.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
